name: 'Sponge'
description:
How to play: Press E/X to squeeze.

by 'Press to Squeeze* aka. 
Jonathan Hertz (Programming & Game Design)
Esbern T. Kaspersen (Programming & Audio Design)
& Nadia P. Larsen (Art & Design)

Tiny game made in Unity for PC.
Sponge is also controller compatible.

Made during Nordic Game Jam 2023 
Theme(s): Contentment, Books and Pore Size?
